HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Huge update:

- The HUD can now be docked to the inspect pane (Default: on)

- The settings button can be found by hovering over the HUD

- The inspect pane modification can be disabled

- Inspect pane now includes buttons for Self-tend and Medical care

- If the HUD is used in undocked mode, the inspect pane can display the selected character log

- Integrated with Pawn Rules (not required)

- Pawn Rules for the character can be selected via the inspect pane. This can be disabled.

- Can hide the gizmo for Pawn Rules (Default: off)

- Integrated with Interaction Bubbles (not required)

- Basic customization options for Interaction Bubbles. More coming soon


The next customization update will focus on custom colors then followed by custom content.
